nodes.bodyText:
So, this used to be an embeddable service - the old bug tracker was able to import it and turn 53b7f2338d33498b in a bug report into something clickable.
At the time of moving to Jira, it was already broken.
So yes, let's delete this. It would be replaced by a proper API on the survey tool side.
There is instead https://st.unicode.org/cldr-apps/browse.jsp which uses ../browse_results.jsp and ../xpath_results.jsp
